ticket.title: Submit Ticket
ticket.description: Describe the issue you encountered, and our support team will reply to you via email as soon as possible.
ticket.feedbackDescription: Logs are being uploaded. Please describe the issue you encountered. The logs will help us locate the problem faster.
ticket.subjectPlaceholder: Briefly describe the issue you encountered
ticket.contentPlaceholder: Please describe the issue in detail, including operation steps, error messages, etc., which will help us resolve the issue faster.
ticket.submitFailed: Failed to submit ticket, please try again later
ticket.emailReplyHint: Our support team will communicate with you via email, please watch for replies in your inbox.
ticket.howItWorksDescription: After submission, the system will send the ticket to the support email and send a copy to your registered email. Subsequent communication will be through email, please ensure you can receive email notifications.
ticket.entryDescription: Encountered a problem? Submit a ticket, we'll reply soon

issues.entryDescription: View issues and official replies from other users
issues.emptyHint: No issues have been submitted yet
